newsitem.title: USA: PMC Intl to acquire ADAM Investment Svcs.
newsitem.headline: PMC Intl to acquire ADAM Investment Svcs.

text.p: PMC International Inc said Monday it struck a definitive agreement to acquire all of the outstanding shares of ADAM Investment Services Inc, a privately held company based in Atlanta.
ADAM will be acquired by PMC International's investment advisor subsidiary, Portfolio Management Consultants Inc.
Terms were not disclosed. The transaction is subject to PMCI raising sufficient funds to pay the purchase price, along with other customary conditions.

ADAM, a registered investment advisor founded in 1980, provides global asset allocation and discretionary portfolio management services, using mutual funds, to more than 3,000 clients representing approximately $1.2 billion of assets, according to a news release issued by PMC International.
